# CursedNova, Gravity, web 

## Description

Everything is upside down on this planet... Can you fix the user interface?

## Solution

That was weird, when I entered the page for the first time, I noticed the floating logo with some weird looking text next to it.
After investigating the element I found the `.css` file which contains some `svg's`. The file is: `styles/resource/css/ingame/navigation.css`

At the bottom of the file we see the following definitions:

```
@keyframes logo {
  0%{
    transform:rotate(0deg)
              translate(-1000px)
              rotate(0deg);

Extracted .svg definitions are:

```
